message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is very valuable and I can't go below $11,000.  It's a fair price for what you're getting.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to offer $10,500 to reach an agreement.
